description:
From a little downtime on the couch with a good book, to out for a trail run or hike, these tights have the kind of stretchy comfort that makes them right for almost anything.

  • Made using recycled PET bottles, 13 bottles went into these leggings
  • Repreve® recycled polyester, lyocell and spandex knit has a comfortable stretch and dries quickly
  • drirelease® lyocell wicks away moisture and is made using wood cellulose from sustainable forests
  • High-waisted design offers coverage
name: Indyeva Perna Tights - Women's
